Service Details: - Sells mobility aids such as wheelchairs, scooters, power chairs, hospital beds, patient lifts, home elevators, wheelchair lifts, ramps, stair lifts, as well as bathroom safety products and aids for daily living- Also offers rentals on light weight wheelchairs, power wheelchairs, scooters, hospital beds, patient lifts, folding ramps, semi-permanent ramps, crutches, and walkers
